name: Shuffle Dance-Board
description:
You are controlling a spaceship on the moon and you think that it is the best place to play pong with your dancer-team!

This game is a pong-like where you should move in rhythm! Every win, you can add one bonus card to your deck or remove one. If you win, a new competitor will come in. If you loose, go play your last opponent with its deck!

You can play against a basic IA or your enemy can be played by a friend in a multiplayer local mode!

Hope you'll like to play it as I liked to develop it ;)
